title: py-torch@1.6.0 produces a GLIBC error when built with CUDA-11

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
When trying to use py-torch -1.6.0 built with CUDA 11 I see the following error:
```console
python -c 'import torch'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/opt/packages/gpjohnsn/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.3.0/py-torch-1.6.0-vw3qfqc6okp7suoc4ifgkdgqab5pvh56/lib/python3.8/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 189, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.22' not found (required by /opt/packages/gpjohnsn/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.3.0/py-torch-1.6.0-vw3qfqc6okp7suoc4ifgkdgqab5pvh56/lib/python3.8/site-packages/torch/lib/libtorch_python.so)
```
This works fine when using `CUDA-10.2.89` and `7.6.5.32-10.2-linux-x64`

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-torch cuda_arch=35,75 ^cudnn@8.0.2.39-11.0-linux-x64
...
```

### Information on your system

```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.11.2-8723-01df552
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512
```
```console
$ spack find -vd py-torch
==> 1 installed package
-- linux-centos7-skylake_avx512 / gcc@9.3.0 ---------------------
py-torch@1.6.0~binary~caffe2+cuda+cudnn~distributed~fbgemm~ffmpeg~gloo~leveldb~lmdb~magma~miopen+mkldnn+nccl~nnpack~opencv+openmp~qnnpack~redis~rocm~tbb~test~xnnpack~zstd cuda_arch=35,75
    cuda@11.0.2
        libxml2@2.9.10~python
            libiconv@1.16
            xz@5.2.5~pic
            zlib@1.2.11+optimize+pic+shared
    cudnn@8.0.2.39-11.0-linux-x64
    eigen@3.3.7 build_type=RelWithDebInfo
    nccl@2.7.8-1+cuda cuda_arch=none
        rdma-core@20 build_type=RelWithDebInfo
            libnl@3.3.0
    openblas@0.3.10~consistent_fpcsr~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none
    protobuf@3.12.2+shared build_type=Release
    py-numpy@1.19.2+blas+lapack
        py-setuptools@50.1.0
            python@3.8.5+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87
                bzip2@1.0.8+shared
                expat@2.2.9+libbsd
                    libbsd@0.10.0
                gdbm@1.18.1
                    readline@8.0
                        ncurses@6.2~symlinks+termlib
                gettext@0.21+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz
                    tar@1.32
                libffi@3.3 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0
                libuuid@1.0.3
                openssl@1.1.1g+systemcerts
                sqlite@3.33.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree
    py-pybind11@2.5.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo
    py-pyyaml@5.3.1+libyaml
        libyaml@0.2.4
```
